title: How to Make a Toast Pizza

steps.headline: Take a slice of bread.
steps.description: Using a knife, cut it diagonally so that you are left with two triangles. Another option is to leave it as a whole slice.

steps.headline: Toast one side of the slice(s) under your grill or in the oven.
When one side is brown, take it out and turn it over.
steps.description: Spread the un-toasted side with tomato puree and cheese. Add your other toppings (optional).

steps.headline: Place the toast back into the oven until the cheese starts to melt.
steps.description: This should only take a few moments.

text: Take a slice of bread. Using a knife, cut it diagonally so that you are left with two triangles. Another option is to leave it as a whole slice. Toast one side of the slice(s) under your grill or in the oven.  When one side is brown, take it out and turn it over. Spread the un-toasted side with tomato puree and cheese. Add your other toppings (optional). Place the toast back into the oven until the cheese starts to melt. This should only take a few moments. Enjoy your toast pizza.
